body.bibl: Horn, Cornelia B. “Jesus and the Alphabet in the Caucasus: A View of the Relationship of the Georgian Infancy Gospel of Thomas to Armenian Infancy Gospel Traditions via Cross-Cultural Intersections with the Syriac, Greek, and Ethiopic Evidence.” In Armenia between Byzantium and the Orient: Celebrating the Memory of Karen Yuzbashian (1927–2009), edited by Bernard Outtier, Cornelia B. Horn, Basil Lourié, and Alexey Ostrovsky, 60–96. Texts and Studies in Eastern Christianity 16. Leiden: Brill, 2020.
